# Visibility.visible

**Case**

The element may be visible.

## Declaration

```swift
case visible
```

## Discussion

Some APIs may use this value to represent a hint or preference, rather than a mandatory assertion. For example, setting list row separator visibility to `visible` using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/listRowSeparator(_:edges:)] modifier may not always result in any visible separators, especially for list styles that do not include separators as part of their design.

## Getting visibility options

- **Visibility.automatic**: The element may be visible or hidden depending on the policies of the component accepting the visibility configuration.
- **Visibility.hidden**: The element may be hidden.
